name: Pizza Delivery Van Simulator - City & Offroad Driving Adventure
name_original: Pizza Delivery Van Simulator - City & Offroad Driving Adventure
description:
Who doesn’t like pizza?

Apart from a very few at the back we don’t see any one raising their hands so we will just go ahead and pretend we never saw them. Pizza is one of the most famous global foods around. Those threads of cheese and chunks of meat…oomph - just so delicious! We are going to stop just short of handing you the recipe of the world’s best pizza and tell you a bit about the game.

Pizza Delivery Van Simulator is a game about delivering hot and fresh pizzas to your customers. The challenge and thrill is about driving the van in city and offroad environment to fulfill the orders. The aroma of the fresh pizzas in the back of your van will keep you going and the driving adventure is super fun. Make those deliveries; don’t forget to get the payment and step on the gas. You are in for a thrilling ride.

We’d love to hear back from you. We continuously strive to improve and while it may or may not show but do know that your feedback and reviews are taken very seriously.
